A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have grown up loving Star Wars\, from the movies to the games. I always thought it would be cool to see new movies with characters like Kyle Catarn and Jan. I have not gotten those movies\,like but I did get a great new look at the Star Wars universe after the fall of the Empire.\n This is a good movie\, does it have some down falls? Yes\, but I still had fun while watching it and am looking forward to buying it when it comes out on Blu-ray/DVD. We all have ideas on how Star Wars should go and if the movie that comes out is not how you thought it should go\, GET OVER YOURSELF. Again it is a great movie\, it even has made just over $1 billion worldwide (Since Dec 31). Great movie and I am looking forward to the next one.
